articles.author: Andrew Romano
articles.title: U.S. sets new COVID hospitalization record, signaling Omicron surge could be less mild than experts hoped - Yahoo News
articles.description: Experts warn that America’s Omicron surge is already more severe than in other countries and will only get worse as it spreads from highly vaccinated cities ...
articles.content: The U.S. set a new COVID-19 hospitalization record Monday, exceeding 140,000 patients for the first time since the start of the pandemic a warning sign, experts say, that the nations Omicron surge is… [+10002 chars]
